about_the_game:
Stellagate is a puzzle action with gates that can connect different locations. Connected areas are seamlessly connected to each other, and you are free to throw blocks in or send lasers through them.

Story

.　Stella, a girl with no memory of her past. She wakes up in a room in a castle, and your role is to take her to the goal.

Puzzle

.　Gates can connect different locations. Connected locations are seamlessly connected to each other and can be moved, thrown in, and passed through at will. The gates themselves can also be transported and placed in any location. The gradually more complex and intertwining elements are sure to be mind-boggling.

name: Stellagate

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Intel Celeron
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
